texts.fr: Marie Chantal Lydie est une jeune femme de 27 ans celibataire avec un enfant de 11 ans à sa charge.Apres ses études,elle a suivi une formation dans le domaine de la coiffure,et pour ce fait elle est en ce moment détentrice d'un salon de coiffure dans un quartier de la place.Compte tenu de la baisse de son rendement,elle voudrait obtenir un credit pour augmenter les greffes, mèches et produits cosmétiques dans son salon. Ceci dans le but d'augmenter sa clientèle, de mieux la satisfaire et d'accroitre aussi sa marge bénéficiaire. les bénéfices générés par ce crédit seront réinvestis en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir et le reste lui permettra à subvenir à ces besoins ainsi que ceux de sa petite famille.
texts.en:
Marie Chantal Lydie, age 27, is a single mother of an 11-year-old dependent child. After her studies, she received training as a hairdresser, and she has since become the owner of a local hair salon. 

With business slowing down, she is seeking a loan to buy hair pieces, weaves and cosmetic products for her salon. Her goal is to increase her client base, to increase client satisfaction and to also grow her profit margin.

The profits generated with this loan will be in part reinvested in her activity and the rest will allow her to take care of her own needs and those of her family.

loans.use: Augmenter le stock des gréfes, mèches et produits cosmétiques.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 30. She is married to a farmer. They have three children. With this loan, she wants to buy more beans to sell. The profits from the business will be used to build a house and make savings.

loans.use: to buy more beans to sell.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is 32 years old and married with seven children.

Elsa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Elsa has been in this business for seven years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Elsa aspires to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: C7943 Coopaki Group

texts.en:
Andre is 38 years old and is married with five children aged between nine and 21 years old. He owns an agricultural business selling rice, and his business is open from 6am to 5pm every day except during the weekend.

Andre is a leader of the group which is called C7943 Coopaki in the local language and is the person sitting in the photo. He currently employs four people to help him, and he has four years of experience in this work. This is his fourth loan.

Andre has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his agricultural business by cultivating more rice to sell. With any profits, he will be able to buy more food for his family, to pay school fees for his children and to renovate his house.

loans.use: to expand his rice business by cultivating more rice to sell.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en: Solange is 24 years old. She sells bicycle spare parts and has been in this business for three years. She wants the loan to buy more tyres and tubes. With the profits from the business she will buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy more bicycle tyres and tubes to sell.

loans.name: Elsa Edith

texts.es: Elsa vive al suroccidente de la ciudad con su familia,  a sus 65 años trabaja diariamente comercializando mercancías a crédito, ella tiene una experiencia de 24 años, e inició su actividad comercial cuando observó la necesidad de compra de mercancía a crédito, entre sus vecinos y amigos a quienes les resultaba difícil adquirir  artículos de primera necesidad para su hogar;  su ventas las realiza a crédito y sus compras de contado, en almacenes que le ofrecen los mejores precios. En la actualidad ha recibido 20 financiamientos, mediante el cual ha logrado construir un capital para su negocio, aumentando el volumen de clientes y otorgando los plazos que requieren para adquirir las mercanica que ella vende y poder fidelizarlos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará electrodomésticos, mecedoras y vajillas, las cuales han solicitado sus clientes en su  actividad  de preventa, que aun practica. Esta es la razón de éxito de su inversión, que la hace sobre las solicitudes de sus mejores compradores y porque conoce muy bien la plaza y el mercado que aborda en su diaria tarea.
texts.en: Elsa lives in the southwestern part of the city with her family. She is 65 years old and works every day selling merchandise on credit. She has 24 years experience and started her commercial activity when she saw the need of buying on credit among her neighbors and friends for whom it was difficult to acquire basic necessity items for their homes. She sells on credit and makes her purchases up front at stores that offer the best prices. So far, she has received 20 loans with which she has been able to build some capital for her business, increasing the number of customers and selling on the terms they need to acquire the merchandise so she can gain their loyalty. Right now, she is applying for a Kiva loan with which she will buy appliances, rockers and dishes. Her customers have asked for these items in her pre-sales activity, which she still does. This is why her investment is successful, because she fills the orders of her best buyers and because she really knows the plaza and market that surround her daily tasks.

loans.use: to buy appliances, rockers and dishes to sell.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en: Diane is 34 years old. She is married to a businessman. They both have three children between two and seven years old. She sells fish and has been in the business for one year. With this loan, she wants to buy more fish to sell. She plans to use the profits to provide food for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials for constructing a green house

loans.name: Vachagan

texts.en:
Vachagan is from Yerevan and about five years ago started a retail business. He owns a little store where he trades clothing and shoes.

 Vachagan lives with his son. This business helps him to have stable income during the year and sustain his family. Due to his kind attitude towards people, he has gained a lot of loyal customers who prefer to buy clothing and shoes only from his store.

 Besides the store in Yerevan, Vachagan also sells clothing in the other towns of Armenia but it is very difficult for him to pay for transportation costs so Vachagan has requested this loan to purchase a car. This will enable him to easily get his products to buyers and sell them.  

 This loan is very important for Vachagan to cut transportation costs and continue the expansion of his business.

loans.use: to pay for a car

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 45 years old, married and has seven children. Three of her children are in school.

Erlinda is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a 14000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Erlinda has been farming vegetables for five years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this business.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es: Luis de 28 años de edad tiene un negocio donde ofrece servicios de fotocopiaje y vende dulces y comestibles en general. Su negocio inició hace 1 años, con la expectativa de generar nuevos ingresos  propios y atendiendo a la necesidad que había en el barrio respecto al servicio de fotocopiaje al que poco a poco agregó comestibles, teniendo en cuenta el potencial de niños que no tenían donde comprar sus dulces pues las tiendas están muy distantes. Su meta es lograr pleno crecimiento y por eso acude a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para aplicar a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a esta organización con el cual comprará mecatos, dulcería, galleta y tinta para abastecer su fotocopiadora.  Luis es un joven muy trabajador, el inicia sus actividades productivas desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche y diariamente de lunes a domingo, con el fin de mejorara poco a poco su nieve de vida y convertir su negocio en el ingreso principal de la familia.
texts.en: Luis is 28 years old. He has a business where he offers copying services and sells candies and general food. He started his business 1 year ago hoping to generate new income on his own and filling the need in the neighborhood for a copying service. Little by little, he added food, taking into account the potential of the children who had nowhere to go to buy candy because the stores were far away. His goal is to grow and that is why he went to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to apply for a Kiva loan, the first loan that he has taken out with this organization. With it, he will buy pastries, candy, cookies and ink for his copier. Luis is a hardworking young man. He starts his working activities around 10 in the morning until 8 at night Monday through Sunday. He does this to improve his quality of life little by little and make his business into his family's main source of income.

loans.use: to buy pastries, candies, cookies, and ink for his copier.
